name: Sonnergy
description:
Sonnergy is a Dungeon Crawler, Roguelike, exclusively for two players that, seeking to end global domination, they must activate objects to temporarily capacitate your duo to be able to fight against enslaved robots of underground of a post-apocalyptic planet.

IMPORTANT NOTE:

We know that there are some bugs to fix, some parts to polish, and that the game is incomplete, but we decided to launch the game to get some feedback.
